subject: JunitReport and Xalan error
msgSnippet: Hi, Long time reader, first time poster... I am having problems creating a junitreport. Here is the snippet:
messageBody:
Hi,

Long time reader, first time poster...

I am having problems creating a junitreport. Here is the snippet:
<target name="testReport"
description="Generates JUnit test report."
depends="init,compile,jar,test">
<junitreport todir="${testReportDir}">
<fileset dir="${testOutDir}">
<include name="TEST-*.xml"/>
</fileset>
<report format="frames" todir="${testReportDir}"/>
</junitreport>
</target>

I have added to my ANT classpath:
xalan 2.5.1 : xalan.jar
xerces 2.5.0: xml-apis.jar
xerces 2.5.0: xercesImpl.jar

When I attempt to run the build file there is no processing and I
receive this error:

BUILD FAILED: java.lang.VerifyError: (class:
org/apache/xerces/parsers/IntegratedParserConfiguration, method:
configurePipeline signature: ()V) Incompatible type for getting or
setting field

Any ideas experts?

Regards, Alan
